website_summaries.verdict: Fewer features than others on our list, but it still gets the job done. Stands out for its extra firm base and recessed cup holder.
pros: Flat surface is reinforced with foam and plastic inserts for added comfort and stability
Dual side pockets for toys and drawing supplies
Dedicated cup and bottle holder is a nice touch
Raised sides keep toys, snacks, and crayons from rolling off
Converts to a backpack for hands free carrying
cons: Side walls are lower than average

customer_reviews.title: It was awesome for coloring
customer_reviews.text: We used this for my 3 year old for a 10 road trip. It was awesome for coloring, eating and playing. We did have problems with the side pockets staying attached when you put things in them but he had just as much interest playing with them off of the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssajane1010

customer_reviews.title: Great for air travel
customer_reviews.text: I searched everywhere for something like this last year for air travel and was so excited to find it as a deal of the day! Just took it on our first trip and it was a lifesaver. Loved the storage space for the activities, the ease of clipping it behind by daughters car seat from either side, the cup holder and the deep lip to prevent things from falling off. I got so many compliments from other parents and the flight attendants
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them, not sure on fabric strength
customer_reviews.text: Our kids have absolutely loved these on trips. The trays give them a good deal of personal choice as to what to do in the car, and eating on the trays is a much easier process than trying to hand back one item at a time. The only reason for 4 stars is that some of the snaps feel like they might pull through the material if not unsnapped carefully. We are not using the snaps at this time, so no holes yet.
customer_reviews.author: flutter

customer_reviews.title: Great tray, strap a little big for tiny kiddos
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent tray for kiddos. My daughter loved the drink holder and I like that it keeps her snacks contained. I also like that the surface is hard enough to color on. The only complaint I have is that the strap that goes around them is very big. My 3 yr old is very little (26lbs) so it slides off her lap a bit. But it works for what we need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: dmercer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose this one after researching many options
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to try a lap tray in the car with my 2 year old but this worked out well! It was comfortable for her so she didn't reject it, the raised sides helped keep crayons and snacks under control, and the surface allowed her to actually color in a book in the car. If I had any tweaks, I'd make the cup holder slightly deeper and I'd love if it could go around the seat instead of her (for easier removal mid- trip) but the aren't complaints. I haven't had it long enough to comment on durability yet but I see no reason to worry so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Super!  And the kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a firm writing surface for the kids when travelling. These are MUCH more than that! The tray is big enough for crayons and coloring book. The cup holder is great for a drink, snacks, or crayons. The side pockets help to keep the tray in place. The big unexpected is that the fairly rigid fabric frame catches crumbs when eating on the go! The extra compartment in the bottom is great for storage, and straps make the whole thing easy for the little ones to carry their own stuff. These are lightweight, well-made, and clean up easily. What a pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: It not a bad product to invest in.
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice product. I just really wished that the cup holder section was a lot deeper than it was to ensure the cups fit securely into place. I would have given this product a 5-star rating for me. The weight of it was awesome it didn't cover my child's original cup holder on his car seat...... which was a major plus in my eyes. Super easy to clean... also a major plus for me as well. It was just that cup holder section that to me needed to be improved on for a true 5-star rating for me. I would love to see that happen to improve my rating.
customer_reviews.author: D Stubblefield

customer_reviews.title: Smells so disgusting. Can't even try it.
customer_reviews.text: I think I got the defective one. I want to return it and get the refund. Because I can't take the smell of this lap desk tray. It has been in our garage for 2 days to get rid of smell. It is still smell so strongly bad. Disgusting. Smells like some kind of chemical. The tray itself is sturdy but I've seen better one. I don't know what makes this smell so bad. Is there a solution for this matter? Our road trip is starting tomorrow and my kid won't get the chance to use it with this smell.(I don't want this smell spread in our car during the trip so I won't bring it) So sad.
customer_reviews.author: sweetpea

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, comfortable size for a lunch. One big pocket underneath suitable for napkins, silverware or crayons and regular size coloring book. Strap can be wrap around wasters avoid product from falling off your lap. Suitable for children and silts alike. Very lightweight. This product is well constructed, well thought off and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline M.

customer_reviews.title: Really thick
customer_reviews.text: I not one of these each for my kids 3 and 6 to hold food on their lap in the car. I didn't use the strap because they were aleadr kind of big and bulky sitting on top of their laps. It brought their food up way to high and my kids had a hard time getting to it. I like the idea and will keep them around. I imagine they will be more useful when my kids are in booster seats instead of car seats with the high arm rests.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works great but buckles are cheap and will break
customer_reviews.text: Love this tray as it works great but within a short few months of occasional use one of the buckles for the strap broke. The buckled are so thin that it was only a matter of time before they gave way. I’m installing a new buckle but I had hoped it would last a little longer for the price. Also the side bags fall off every time my son puts something into them. When the buckle was whole it works great for my son to eat or play on and I think it’s worth repairing to keep using.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smathers

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise looks like a good product
customer_reviews.text: Zipper came apart while trying to assemble. Otherwise looks like a good product, pretty disappointed about the zipper not sure I feel comfortable letting my toddler have it with it open.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Hague

customer_reviews.title: This product made well - sturdy stitching and materials
customer_reviews.text: This product made well - sturdy stitching and materials. Cupholder could be deeper, but obviously it cant go down too low or the kid would knock it out with their leg. You have to insert the foam and plastic support yourself when you receive it. I thought this was weird at first but I realized that kept the outer rim or the tray intact for shipping. This company obviously cares about their products and I appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Drake

customer_reviews.title: An Ingenious Idea - Tray to Make Travel Easier
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful idea and I can't wait to give it to grandchildren at Christmas. Seller provided a lovely product that had instructions how to assemble the foam and plastic in the zippered place made for it. I put a coloring book and a few supplies in the zippered compartments. I highly recommend this for the car. The tray will encourage use of their minds and creative abilities because it makes it easier to work in the car and hold onto supplies or food.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: The family was headed out on a 1,000 mile vacation trip. I bought this for my three year old grandson, who loved it. So did his mom. The tray keeps anything from falling, so he could play with his hit wheels cars without losing them. The cup holder provided him him with ready access to his drink and the pouches were home to his snacks. And when he was ready to watch a video, the iPad fit into the tray perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: GuideStar

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my older daughter 12. She needed something to help her hold her tablet and papers for school when we travel. It works great and keeps the pencils from rolling onto the floor of the car. She likes the pockets to put papers and books. So it works good for older kids as well as younger kids (my younger daughter is 3 1/2). My younger daughter does want it off after a while, but still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: April Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This was a game changer for our flight to Disneyland. My toddler is just too rough with the airplane trays and on top of that his activities always end up falling on the airplane floor. Not anymore!! This tray kept all of his activities together and off the floor. And the fact that it turns into a little backpack was just perfect! Highly recommend! We even had a flight attendant ask where we had purchased for her own toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great idea... maybe not the best product for it yet
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of this product! Greatly thought-out... BUT, the first time we use, trying to unbutton the drop-down side-pockets, 2 of the 3 buttons attaching the pocket to the tabletop rip right out of the fabric! So now the pocket is hanging by 1 button... and now im afraid to pull on any of the pockets for fear that more will rip out. Such a bummer! 👎🏼 I would give these a 5, but for that design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: lauren freyermuth

customer_reviews.title: The top is not as sturdy as expected
customer_reviews.text: The top is not as sturdy as expected, the "drink" spot is very shallow, the red liner is flimsy, it keeps folding over. If you have two car seats next to each other the side pocket is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice tray
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Think with the current car seat I have, cosco Seneca, my child is not quite tall enough to use it appropriately. She is 2 and in the 29th percentile and the table is angled as she sits. It is also hit or miss if she can reach the cup holder. Will probably be better as she gets older and changes car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great travel table for kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: Really cool travel table for the price. The inside table is a piece of sturdy foam and flat piece of plastic. The cup holder can hold a “baby” hydroflask! I particularly like the lip around the table to keep things from falling off onto the car floor. There are a lot of fancier ones out there but idk - this one was good for us!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tray. The fold down flap helps when coloring or drawing. The strap has a lot of room to go all the way around the car seat or chair or tighten it to go around a child's waist plus it has connectors on each side so you can undo it no matter which side of the car your child sits. It's a good size and has a cup holder (or car/marker/snack holder). I like that the side pockets can unsnap and be stored away if you're not using them. It was really helpful on our 9 hour car ride!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Mann

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again/Perfect for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these trays for traveling with our kids. They are perfect for meals in the car. Our oldest two kids love to draw and this provides them with a table that is the perfect size to accommodate their artwork in the car. We have a one year old and in another year I will be buying another one of these for him!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DISTRACTION!
customer_reviews.text: This is very helpful keeping my autistic granddaughter occupied with her very own favorite toys while traveling in the car
customer_reviews.author: Joan P.

customer_reviews.title: Edge around the top needs work
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and nicely built. The tray comes with a foam and a plastic insert which you slide in through a zipper pocket. The edge around the top is also pretty sturdy, though I wish it didn't go completely around the top. You can unbotton and fold down the part towards where your child will sit, but the flap is hard to fold down and I just know my kid is going to be bugged by it touching them.
customer_reviews.author: Chidwick

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel with kids!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these to try out with our daughter. It's awesome! The little cup holder is just the right size for a dish of ice cream if we go and get treats. The tray is a nice size that can hold coloring books and crayons. It has a lip on the top to keep stuff from falling. It also has zipper pockets that snap up out of the way. We ended up buying three more so we had one for each child in each vehicle!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Gilles

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers and the car!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and was a little concerned about the quality, but they for sure have updated their product to fix previous issues. I have a five and two year old and they both use it well. My five year old can pack and carry it by herself with the backpack straps. It's perfect for long car rides - she will bring small puzzles, coloring books, magnet dolls, and snacks!
customer_reviews.author: Dane B.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Several things I don't like about this product. The cup holder is not deep enough to hold a cup. The red sides aren't tall enough to really prevent things from falling off the tray. The tray itself feels like nothing more than a piece of stiff cardboard. It served a purpose somewhat but not for everything we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for rearfacing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my rear facing toddler. It didn’t fit over her car seat like I would’ve liked. She also couldn’t get into it at all so she required adult help while on the road. It is easy to clean though and would work well with a front facing car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Useless!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is useless!!! My toddler, and now 4 year old is not able to use it - this lap desk sits too high, making it impossible to use. I thought once my toddler grew (taller) it would work as it should - nope! Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Angela A

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver for road trips with kids
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for our 4.5 year old on our recent 7 hour road trip. She LOVES to color, this fit nicely on her lap and kept the markers and crayons from spilling all over the car. I'm not exaggerating when I say that this tray kept her occupied for HOURS and made our road so much more pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Nice tray but didn't work for our car
customer_reviews.text: The tray is nicely made and very easy to use. Sadly the way the car seat is positioned in my car and where the passenger side armrest comes out the tray did not fit correctly. I managed to finder a work around but it was a compromise and my child wasn't able to use the drink holder. I probably won't be able to use it until my child is out of a car seat and sitting on a booster. Info: My car is x3 and the car seat is front facing.
customer_reviews.author: aplarosa

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have for your busy little ones!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a total game changer for traveling with my 2 year old! We travel often (2-4x a week) sometimes taking 5 hours round trip. With my busy little girl this allows us to have large storage pockets that we keep coloring books, crayons, reading books, tablet, small toys and snacks handy and a place to stay in the car ready for the next time. She has spilled her drink on it and crumbs from snacks and I was able to just wipe it off with a damp cloth to come clean. It dried fast and there was no staining. For sure a traveling must have!
customer_reviews.author: Zack Bertola

customer_reviews.title: Good in the car
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my daughter to use on a long car ride this summer. It worked great as a lap desk so she could have a place to color and draw. The raised sides are great to keep crayons and other items from rolling to the floor. THe cupholder in the tray was pretty useless as a cupholder. It was too shallow to actually hold a water bottle. It could be used to hold other lighter items. I'm not sure about cleaning this items either. Lots of stray marker marks, but they won't come out with just being wiped down. THe tray is covered with fabric so can't just be wiped down.
customer_reviews.author: Leah L

customer_reviews.title: Good  car helper for snacks and activities.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well For meals and activity for my 5yo grandson+ 3yo granddaughter. I loop the strap around the front seat headrest and it sets at the right spot for each of their use. The only problem is I had to add a2nd strap along the long side (opposite the child) in order to keep it balanced + in place.
customer_reviews.author: MEF

customer_reviews.title: Modfamily this could be a great product if you had some quality control
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 grey ones and got one Grey and one red. The red one came as you would expect a new product to. The grey one came all out together and missing snaps so the pockets hang off wrong. I was so excited to get these and now I’m a bit upset because not only was the order wrong and they were broken but there was absolutely no info on how to return them. Modfamily this could be a great product if you had some quality control.
customer_reviews.author: lynnette

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: A must needed car/ travel accessory. My 3 and 5 year old NEEDED this . It is light enough for them to carry into car and easy for them to strap around themselves. Game changer for long or short car rides .
customer_reviews.author: Margherita  McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Received tray with a strap that has buckle with male end, but missing female end. Looks like they forgot to see it on entirely. Can’t buckle tray around kid’s waist, tray slips off his lap.
customer_reviews.author: Glangchai - Nguyen Family

customer_reviews.title: The kids really enjoyed being able to comfortably do activities and eat with ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my 4 year old twins for a road trip and they were a lifesaver! The kids really enjoyed being able to comfortably do activities and eat with the tray. They also slept comfortably for hours while the tray was strapped to them. I highly recommend this product to anyone traveling with kids or needing to keep kids occupied in the car without making a mess. Great product, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: May Sabah

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my kiddos in the car. My son used to drop his cars on the ground while in the car. With the lips on the lap desk he is able to play with his cars without dropping them. And my daughter loves it both for homework, playing, as well as drawing/coloring!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Cureton

customer_reviews.title: 7hrs of bliss with a 1 and 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Took 2 of these on their 7hr maiden voyage from Idaho to Western Washington with a 1 year old and a 3 year old. Best decision of my life. I was able to just place a new toy on the tray or hand back a snack. Also, both girls were able to still fall asleep comfortable without having to stop the car and remove the trays. WIN!!!! We do this drive about twice a month and this was our best trip yet. (BOTH WAYS!!)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Joy Sherman

customer_reviews.title: great product and price
customer_reviews.text: great product and price. only issue would be the "sidewalls" along the tray are between flimsy and solid so they don't stand as well...bend under anything . But the cupholder part is good for crayons/etc. needs a small directions paper on where the 2 inserts belong. Took me a sec . is wide if your seat has high arm rests it will sit up on top of them. But worth it !
customer_reviews.author: RONI RU RU

customer_reviews.title: It was a great idea, but our daughter quickly tired of it ...
customer_reviews.text: We just used this on our trip. It was a great idea, but our daughter quickly tired of it and wanted it off. We will try again as it was very sturdy, and was a good surface for her to color, and do her "work." I only gave it a 4 star rating because it was difficult to put on and take off as often as we had to on our trip.
customer_reviews.author: tankersleyr

customer_reviews.title: Best, most sturdy yet flexible kids travel tray!
customer_reviews.text: We got this lap tray for our 4 year old and a different brand for our 2 year old. This product blows the other brand away. The inner styrofoam and board makes this lapboard incredibly sturdy, yet it remains flexible. Pockets are awesome for storage, and the fact that it’s simple and can become a backpack a bonus too!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylene B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This definitely worked just as it should! My daughter needed to take her laptop in the car (she's in a high back booster) for school (she does online school). It buckled around her easily and her laptop didn't slide all over. I liked that the front edge can be unsnapped and folded over so that it was comfortable for her wrists while typing. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer13

customer_reviews.title: NOT JUST FOR KIDS !!! PERFECT FOR TRAVELING FAMILY !!!
customer_reviews.text: Not just for kids, perfect for any age ! ... This is a great product. As a family that is always on the go , was very difficult for my blind father to “eat on the go “ not anymore with the spacious area, rimmed tray and adjustable band (around back) made him feel very at ease and comfortable ! Thank you for such a universal product !!!! (side pockets snap on but are very flimsy / will be sewing on & adding velcro for pocket to stay closed!)
customer_reviews.author: colleen kiernan

customer_reviews.title: So great for a roadtrip
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe I haven't order one of these sooner. We did a cross country road trip and these thing was the best- she was able to color, eat, play with her toys. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great for long road trips with young ones
customer_reviews.text: We used this on a 14 hour road trip from AZ to CO with our 2 year old. It kept his toys in his tray vs on the floor and fit a Dollar Tree cookie tray perfectly for when he wanted to snack or play with magnetic or sticky items. I was easy to wipe off during the ride for spills. I will definitely get another one if we have another child.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very handy, just check to make sure you get everything
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for our daughter and it was superb, so went ahead and bought a 2nd one for our son since we were planning a road trip. His came but the foam support piece you need for the tray to work wasn't in the packaging so his is totally useless, can't be used at all. Very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: The travel lap desk keeps all of my kids art supplies and toys in one place.
customer_reviews.text: The travel lap desk makes drawing and playing in the car a lot easier. My son was able to lay his coloring book flat and keep all of his crayons from falling down into the black holes of the car. It helped him stay entertained because his toys stay in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Alba

customer_reviews.title: Travel life saver
customer_reviews.text: So convenient! This item has a great price point, small family businesses are the best to buy products from. Well made, totally worth the purchase! Made traveling so much easier. Kept most things in front of my child while on the road. Didn’t have to reach back much in effort to retrieve items that fell because it all stayed on the tray! Life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Traveling with toddlers without technology
customer_reviews.text: We were headed to a campground in another state, about a six hour drive with our grandchildren, age 2 and 4. They loved having these trays. The 2 year old played with his legos and my granddaughter was able to set up her doll and all the accessories and have room to color. The cup holder was very handy for them. When they didn’t want to use them, it was very easy to unclip and put on the floor. I know we will use these for many future trips. Thank you for an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: These are a must have for the car!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these! There's plenty of space to store notebooks, crayons, markers, and pencils. They love having all the space for their creative outlet when we're driving and the hard plastic insert allows for it to be a firm surface. It works great for eating in the car as well and keeps it contained. The ripstop fabric is amazing. Wipes off really well and washes great! We took them camping as well and it worked great as a table in the camp chairs. I have told all of my friends with kids to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: The Lekker Way

customer_reviews.title: Road trip lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a lifesaver this road trip. It keeps things wrangled for the kids. The pockets snap off so easily that they immediately were on the floor of the car but my kids don’t understand the purpose of leaving them in place. We have used it for snacks, drinks, and crafting. The lip is great especially because it goes all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Poor execution. Not enough support
customer_reviews.text: Great idea.. But there's just not enough support to hold the desk upright without it tilting toward the floor. My daughter found it more irritating than helpful
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake82

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This trey works great in the car for my kids. They both argue over who gets it so it’s a definite win. My only issue is it’s hard to store without bending the sides. My kids tend to throw it on the floor and step on it which isn’t good for it.
customer_reviews.author: Flkrazykat77

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old son loves this travel tray! Its very easy to use and the straps keep it in place. He is actually choosing to play with his cars on this tray instead of playing with his tablet on long rides!
customer_reviews.author: Eusea Family

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this tray. I am so glad I dint. It solves a lot i problems riding in car with a toddler. Well designed. Very usefull. I am a grandmother if a 20 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My 2yo insisted he test drive the tray as soon as he saw it. Should be a great addition to the ‘keep mom and toddler sane while driving across the country’ bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Just meh
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t really like this laptray. It’s not very convenient and doesn’t stay in place unless you strap it around the car seat whic is not convenient for road trips because your child can’t remove it by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and not worth spending the money on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this travel tray in hopes of using it with an umbrella stroller that didn't have a snack tray on vacation. This thing does not stand up on its own and basically will just hang off of your child's lap. I tried to balance it out with cardboard inside and it did nothing. It was a waste of money and I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would work for older kids
customer_reviews.text: They did not sit in the car seat. The sat on top of arm rest, which didn't work for my little ones since it came up to their armpits. My kids are 3 &4
customer_reviews.author: Mrb

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your little ones
customer_reviews.text: My 2yo son loves it he allways wants it attached when he's in the car holds his drink and his toys no more toys sliding all over the place and having to pull over to get them.
customer_reviews.author: P F

customer_reviews.title: This is a great item for young children going on road trips and ...
customer_reviews.text: Follow-up to my previous review - The company contacted me and immediately sent a replacement out to me. This is a great item for young children going on road trips and the company stands behind their product! Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Smenden

customer_reviews.title: Not for backward facing
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a 12 hour road trip with our 2 year old. She’s backwards facing and it didn’t work, the table came up to her neck. Hopefully we will be able to use it once we turn her around to forward facing this summer. (We have a Graco Click Connect car seat).
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but for older kids
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but didn’t hook well with my car seat. I’ve got a standard Graco grow with me car seat but this wouldn’t strap on to stay out. It works great but has to be held on the child’s lap which is inconvenient and impossible for a toddler to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for eating on the run in the car!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are often being driven at lunch time to various places and it’s thenobly time to eat in the car. This keeps them from spilling everywhere and makes it easy for them to hold their iPads as well.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The produce itself seems great! I need to return due to my kids not liking the idea of it resting in their lap.. guess this is my fault.. but, I actually love the sturdy ness of it, also all the pockets! So, if your child won’t mind it resting on their legs as a support, then I say it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: MommyOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: Works great, kept my son busy on a long car ride
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son for our car trip to see family for Christmas. He liked it, and spent a lot of time using it during the drives. I liked that it was the right size for a coloring book, that it has the ability to be strapped around him so it didn’t slip off, and that the raised sides kept his colored pencils from sliding off. It’s a cool product.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Dubs

customer_reviews.title: Tips
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy. Slides off or the tray tips. Not that easy to tighten around your kids seats when they're buckled in.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Its a pity cause its perfect size, and was useful while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It got destroyed after one wash (of the fabric). You would asume that a tray, for food, for kids, could be washed.... Its a pity cause its perfect size, and was useful while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Begoña Garcia

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. As you can see by the picture my two year old is not quite tall enough for it to be comfortable. I thought maybe the one side piece that unbuttoned would come completely off but it doesn’t. It barely even bends still making it difficult for her to reach things on the tray. It’ll work for now and hopefully she’ll grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Need a smaller size to fit car seat better
customer_reviews.text: It's too big for my daughter's car seat. It doesn't fit nice nor evenly on her lab. It stays diagonal and crooked, so my kids get so frustrated. I used it only twice because they just don't like it crooked on their lab. I hope you guys can make the same product but in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: soraya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: This lap tray is perfect if you need to travel with a toddler or child. It can be strapped around their waste as to not interfere with car seats. Can you be used to play games, color, watch an ipad or video game, eat snacks etc...It does have a cup holder opening on top of table and two side pockets to store items in. Seems to be good quality and easy to wipe clean! Would recommend this to anyone who is in need of a tray to hold items for a young child while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy1

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, with more storage than I had anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: I drive school bus, and my 2 year old daughter rides with me every day. This travel tray has worked wonderfully, she now places her cup in the holder instead of throwing it, and she is enjoying coloring or reading her books that are now always within her reach.
customer_reviews.author: Boots

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t install properly; disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This could be a user error on our part, but my husband and I couldn’t ever figure out how to properly install this thing. It seems flimsy and didn’t really meet our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece when my brother was taking his family on a road trip. I love the sides that hold crayons and markers from rolling off of her lap. She also played card games on top of this. I also love the storage in the back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Loyal

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this tray
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this tray! My little one loves the cup holder which is helpful when the car turns a corner. Love that the inside pieces are separate - so that it makes for easy cleaning. Very impressed with the instructions that the company provided so that it was super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and incredibly useful for trips with your kiddo in the car. Easy to put on and get off and to clean. 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Vitols

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, kept the kids busy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well-made, lightweight, and fits over the car seats well. The kids colored for a bit and enjoyed a few snacks.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it and do I!
customer_reviews.text: We love our travel tray! We bought ours for our 7 and 5 year olds bc we travel to Grandma’s house a lot and the car is always a mess and unorganized by the time we get there! It made the drive go by so much faster bc they were entertained coloring, doing homework, playing with Pokémon cards and eating snacks on the tray. It kept everything contained and organized! It is so easy to clean and a really good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: KPlicka

customer_reviews.title: Keeping children happy when traveling long ways
customer_reviews.text: Travel lap tray is perfect for traveling, the straps to fasten can be a pain especially if u have a child who constantly changes her mind, crayons can roll off
customer_reviews.author: Squirt

customer_reviews.title: The insert is far too bulky..
customer_reviews.text: Eh, I've been searching for one for a while and thought this was it. It's bulky. It would be perfect for a booster seat but not a toddler car seat. I took the insert out and put in a piece of sturdy cardboard so my child could actually use it.. I might return it.. :/
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our road trip
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is lightweight and has the rim around the edge that prevents things from going everywhere. It has a hard surface that makes coloring easy. It was perfect for our long road trip!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wright

customer_reviews.title: Just got ours
customer_reviews.text: We just received two of these today. First the reason i gave it 4 stars instead of 5. On one of the trays, the button was broken. The button that hold the net under neat. What I like is the cup holder and the foam form that is placed in side that made it stable enough to eat, color among other activities.
customer_reviews.author: DHKey

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a great tray for your little one, especially for traveling, this is the one you need!!
customer_reviews.author: Kguy89

customer_reviews.title: Missing clip
customer_reviews.text: I just received our lap tray and as we are heading out on our 16 hour road trip we see that it is missing the buckles so it actually useless for our 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for road trips!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my daughter's rear facing car seat and it fit just fine. This is a great tray for the road trips. My daughter is probably not old enough to truly appreciate it (coloring, etc.) but it was very helpful come snack time in the car. I was able to put her food on the tray for her to grab vs me handing her one piece at a time from the drivers seat! She also used it to rest her books on while "reading." I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Brittan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a long drive
customer_reviews.text: Great for our upcoming vacation. My nephew will love being able to drive his cars on it while we drive. It seems like it is nice and sturdy and easy to clean. He can’t wait to use in on our long drive.
customer_reviews.author: L Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for booster seats, not great for full sized car seats.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my 4 year old’s booster seat, but doesn’t fit well on my two year olds car Seat. The flaps on the side are useless for the car seat bc they don’t hang over the sides and the tray itself is practically in his face bc it doesn’t fit between the sides of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Candace H.

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, bad design
customer_reviews.text: Good idea to make traveling less of a headache, to bad the straps don’t go around my 3 year old daughters waist even when fully extended, past the date of return so I guess I’m stuck with something I can’t use
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Glad i purchased
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an upcoming trip for my 3yo. Im really glad i did. Good size, easily wipeable & its not an uncomfortable design for my daughter in the carseat. I had no issues with the clips that previous people had posted.
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: I loved the idea of having this in the car for ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of having this in the car for my little one however this arrived with a broken zipper so a return/refund is in the works.
customer_reviews.author: iamdizz

customer_reviews.title: No thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t stay around my younger sons lap or my much older daughter’s. I returned it. I couldn’t find a use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Flat surface is a foam very difficult to write on. I have three car seats and it did not fit any of them. Never use it
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: A must for all kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this! They fight over who gets to use it. It’s interesting how easy it is to use. We love the ease and convenience it provides at an affordable price. The top part is easier to clean, however if you spill a sauce it’s more difficult to get out. I wish there was a different material. There isn’t a time where our kids don’t want it now.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it's decent, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this one after having a bad experience with the first "toddler tray" I bought. This type is just pretty flimsy and hard to keep things from falling off. I did finally found one I really like, so I guess 3 time's the charm.
customer_reviews.author: Doug H

customer_reviews.title: Snap broken
customer_reviews.text: Just received this tonight and went to open it up and the snap is broken...didn’t even get to use it! I want it for an upcoming trip therefor will not return it but now I cannot snap the side mesh pockets back to pack it up....
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Meehan Alford

customer_reviews.title: Didn't quite fit
customer_reviews.text: We have a Graco carseat, and this didn't quite fit correctly. My kiddo still used it sort of crookedly to watch movies on her tablet, so it was good for a 3 hour roadtrip. But I probably wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lucille

customer_reviews.title: Functional life saver for road trips with toddler
customer_reviews.text: This lap travel tray is really good quality and functional. I love that the inside hides a foam cushion to keep it soft on my child’s Legs, but also a semi-hard plastic insert to make it easy for drawing or other activities. I can tell already that it’s going to be a life saver during our road trips this summer with a 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: JBrom

product_meta.title: Kids E-Z Travel Lap Desk Tray by Modfamily - Universal Fit for Car Seat, Stroller & Airplane - Organized Access to Drawing, Snacks, and Activities. Includes Bonus Printable Travel Games - (Red)
feature_bullets: ✏️ THE TRAY YOU WISH YOU HAD: With our activity trays for kids, your child will have easy access to all of their snacks, coloring supplies, and activities to stay entertained while on the road. Our play tray table includes foam and plastic tray inserts to create a solid, flat surface for your baby to write and color on. You will wish you had a tray like this when you were a child!

✏️ TRAVEL IN COMFORT: Lap desks encourage creativity and decrease the amount of bickering in the backseat. Featuring a zipper-protected pocket and expandable storage to hold notebooks, crayons, snacks, or a puzzle, our large lap trays are bigger than most others on the market, measuring 12” x 15” x 3”! Patent Pending!

✏️ EASY CLEAN UP: Along with keeping all the loose ModFamily Paint Sticks, crayons, markers, and food in one place to make cleaning your vehicle easier, our lap desks also easily wipe down after any spills and are machine washable when needed. While your toddler is using a lap desk, you can focus more on the road and not worry about digging for that run-away crayon or snack.

✏️ CARRYING MADE SIMPLE: Whether you are on a road trip or prefer air travel, your child can choose to carry their lap desk as a backpack or as a messenger bag and take it wherever they go! Traveling is easy. Simply thread the strap through the loop in the middle of the tray, and you can create loops to form a backpack. You can also keep the strap long so your child can wear it as a messenger bag.

✏️ ENTERTAIN WITHOUT ELECTRONICS: Encourage your child’s pure imagination and stimulate their brain by allowing them to be creative on your long road trip or on that dreaded doctor's appointment. As the perfect parent accessories, our lap tray allows you to entertain your kid on a busy or boring day and keep them from fighting with their siblings without having to stick them in front of a screen.
